member.name: MIB_BEST_IF
member.summary: TheMIB_BEST_IF structure stores the index of the interface that has the best route to a particular destination IPv4 address.

member.name: MIB_BEST_IF.dwDestAddr
member.summary: Specifies the IPv4 address of the destination.

member.name: MIB_BEST_IF.dwIfIndex
member.summary: Specifies the index of the interface that has the best route to the destination address specified by the dwDestAddr member.
